events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or an exchange for a different size as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves refund or exchange due to size issues, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah M., who handles returns and exchanges.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m Sarah and I’ll help you with your refund or exchange today.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product is unopened or worn so we can proceed with your refund or exchange?
The order number is 87923415. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging. Please process the refund promptly.
Thank you for the details. We will approve your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label for return shipping and look forward to the refund.
We have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have returned the jacket and if you have received the refund as expected.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday and I received the refund today. Thanks again for the excellent service!
Closing this case as resolved. We’re glad you are satisfied with the refund and our support assistance.
